"Portal 2" is essentially the same fare as "Portal," its predecessor, but widely improved and expanded. In my opinion, it is a very good game. If you enjoyed "Portal," you will almost certainly enjoy "Portal 2."

Good game. On sale it's only 99 cents, so if you want it, don't buy it for $10, it's a 6-8 hour game, not worth $10. It also has a co-op and community rooms, but I haven't tried those.

The plot's pretty interesting, but it doesn't really matter if you played the first one to really understand it.

This game is a pure masterpiece. It is a mix between many things like lore, humor, and challenges. There was never a second during this game where I was bored. You can play it casually by just going through it or you can explore every test chamber and area for secrets (which there are a lot of btw). 9/10 game for me

I got this game from a family member( will not say for me privacy) and It was a birthday gift a few years ago, and I still own the game, To whoever is reading this, you should really buy this product, you will really enjoy the product, I would recommend  the bundle which will get you portal and Portal 2.

Yall can hate me if u want... I just dont understand the hype.

this game is truly innovative, with a portal gun solving puzzles and stuff. But i was bored to the bone after the first few. I never finished the game as I just didnt enjoy it as I hoped I would. got this on sale for like 90 cents, but its not worth its price. The story had a slow ring to it and was just ignored when u started completing puzzles.

So I'd recommend this game for the sakes that u can tell friends u played the game, but its not worth its price. Get it on sale so u can try it out urself.
